content: this is a crochet pattern not a finished product you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make the riverbed blanket this pattern also includes a crochet diagram images and written instructions as well as a link to the youtube video to follow along this blanket is worked in the flat you will be changing colours in every row to join the new colour you will use the invisible knot but you can also weave in the ends as you go all stitches are basics there s no stitch that a beginner can t do but i do recommend knowing all the basics before starting size 14 sizes available from lovey to king size skill level confident beginner the pattern uses standard american terms yarn worsted weight yarn #4 wool-ease by lion brand yarn i would love to see your finished products tag me on instagram @cj dsgn and use the hashtag #riverbedblanket refund there are no refunds on patterns please note that you can find this pattern for free with ads and only 1 size 47 x 44 available on my blog at cjdesignblog com resell finished product with pattern credit © 2024 cj design all rights reserved
